long_description: With vibrant graphics, the Speck CandyShell Inked Case for iPhone(R) 5/5s armors your phone in a hard, scratch-resistant shell to help protect it from the hard knocks of your active lifestyle. Patented design provides 2 layers of protection in a single-piece construction that is easy to put on and take off. Hard outer shell guards against impact and adds strength and durability. Soft cushioned interior, reinforced corners and rubbery ridges absorb shock from occasional bumps and drops. The Speck CandyShell Inked Case features a raised bezel and rubberized button covers that help keep your phone's screen and buttons safe.
short_description: With vibrant graphics, the Speck CandyShell Inked Case for iPhone(R) 5/5s armors your phone in a hard, scratch-resistant shell to help protect it from the hard knocks of your active lifestyle.
